About Dr. Lawrence Adu

Board-Certified Psychiatrist with 17+ Years of Excellence

Schedule Consultation Call (352) 378-9116

Meet Dr. Lawrence Adu

Dr. Lawrence Adu is a board-certified psychiatrist with over 17 years of experience providing exceptional mental health care in Gainesville, Florida. His expertise spans forensic psychiatry, TMS therapy, addiction medicine, and comprehensive psychiatric care.

Professional Credentials

  • Board-Certified by the American Board of Psychiatry and Neurology
  • 17+ years of patient care excellence
  • Specialized training in forensic psychiatry
  • Expert in NeuroStar TMS therapy
  • Addiction medicine certification
  • Licensed to practice in Florida

Areas of Expertise

Forensic Psychiatry

Expert evaluations for legal proceedings, competency assessments, and expert witness testimony.

TMS Therapy

FDA-approved transcranial magnetic stimulation for treatment-resistant depression.

Addiction Medicine

Comprehensive addiction treatment including medication-assisted therapy and recovery planning.

General Psychiatry

Complete psychiatric evaluation, diagnosis, and treatment for all mental health conditions.

Education & Training

2007

Board Certification

American Board of Psychiatry and Neurology

2005

Psychiatry Residency

Completed comprehensive psychiatry residency training

2003

Medical Degree

Doctor of Medicine (MD) from accredited medical school

Treatment Philosophy

Dr. Adu believes in providing compassionate, evidence-based care that addresses the whole person, not just symptoms.

His approach combines the latest medical treatments with a deep understanding of each patient's unique circumstances. Dr. Adu is committed to:

  • Personalized treatment plans tailored to each patient's needs
  • Evidence-based medicine combined with compassionate care
  • Collaborative approach involving patients and families
  • Continuous learning and staying current with medical advances
  • Respect for patient dignity and confidentiality

Ready to Begin Your Mental Health Journey?

Schedule a consultation with Dr. Adu to discuss your mental health needs and treatment options.
